title: Increase in investment spending in AD-AS

content.question: An economy is in long-run macroeconomic equilibrium. What will be the short-run effects of an increase in investment spending?

choices.label: An increase in real output, an increase in unemployment, and a decrease in the price level
An increase in real output, an increase in unemployment, and an increase in the price level
An increase in real output, a decrease in unemployment, and an increase in the price level
A decrease in real output, a decrease in unemployment, and a decrease in the price level
A decrease in real output, a decrease in unemployment, and no change in the price level

content.answer: An increase in real output, a decrease in unemployment, and an increase in the price level

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
